title: Swarna Rekha Vanki Bangles: A Touch of Modern Tradition
materials: G-H Color). Features Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: These uniquely designed bangles feature a contemporary Vanki (inverted 'V') shape. Each 'V' is studded with a cluster of brilliant-cut diamonds in a prong setting, maximizing their sparkle. The gold frame has a smooth, polished finish showcasing a sleek design.
colors: Golden hue from the 22K gold is beautifully contrasted with the dazzling white of the diamonds.
occasions: or as an everyday statement piece. Ideal for weddings
or even a cocktail party. Can be paired with traditional silk sarees or western outfits.
description: A stunning fusion of modern aesthetics and traditional South Indian design. The use of high-quality diamonds and 22K gold ensures enduring value. The Vanki design, traditionally worn as armlets, is reimagined in a bangle, offering a contemporary twist to a classic motif. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear.
